detaileddescription.para: This php script runs in the local machine as user 'apache', is the 'father' process. In a remote machine (our grid User Interface) we open a 'child' process, and it's runs as the user validated before. That user must connect via ssh to the User Interface without password See http://www.cs.umd.edu/~arun/misc/ssh.html and http://www.openssh.com/ Remember that the User Interface has mounted a directory in the local machine
Protein-Protein Docking and Protein-Ligand Docking Home site
